title: pocket picture
body:
Pairing: Thor x Bruce 

Summary: Bruce is a proud boyfriend. 

Prompt: “That´s it, I´m taking my wallet out.”

Warnings: none 

Words: 485

Bruce hated high school reunions. He might have more PhD than any of them and he might be the one to work with the Avengers but to them he was still just nerdy Bruce.

It wasn´t like he didn´t have any friends back in high school, just not that many and he wasn´t even sure if they were going to come. He sure as hell didn´t want to. But then he was reminded that it would be good to see how his anxiety had improved. Also, you should face your fears, right? (Bruce thought that was bullshit, at least when it came to him and social anxiety)

So, Bruce went. And people remembered him. People that changed. Who were now nice to him. He didn´t know if it was because they were scared he would turn into Hulk or because he knew Tony Stark or Captain America, but it was nice to be treated like a normal human being and not like a freak or a nerd or some kind of weirdo. It was nice to have a normal conversation.

“Josh and I just moved to Kansas,” one of his old class mates told him. “It´s not really what I dreamt of but his family lives there, so…”

“There sure is worse,” Bruce said sipping on his drink.

She nodded, taking a sip of her own drink. “What about you?”

Bruce merely raised a brow to her. “Well, have you spent all your time getting PhD and saving the world or have you found someone you would move to Kansas for?”

He smiled over the rim of his glass. She wouldn´t believe him if he told her. People never do. “I have. It´s one of my teammates actually.”

She set her drink aside. “Who?” she asked curiously, leaning forward.

Whatever, Bruce thought. I´ll just tell her. “It´s Thor.”

Had she not set her drink aside, she would have choked on it. “You have sex with a god?” She whisper-yelled over the table they were sat on. “That is the first thing you thought of?” Bruce laughed.

“I don´t believe you,” she said, eyeing him suspiciously.

“I have a picture of us,” He smirked, taking yet another sip from his glass, knowing how people freak out once they see the tiny photo of Thor carrying him while kissing his cheek that Steve shot while trying out new technologies. It had been a warm day and Thor wanted Bruce to come into the pool. He, in return, didn´t move an inch from his position at the bar so the god had decided to take manners into his own hands (literally). It didn´t bother Bruce as much as he said it would. Sometimes it was nice to be manhandled and showed once again how strong his boyfriend was.

“No, you don´t,” Natalie all but gasped.

“That´s it, I´m taking my wallet out,” Bruce declared, fumbling with his pocket.

title: Locked Out Of Valhalla
body:
You find out that Loki has virtually no sexual experience, and you decide to help him out.

Locked Out Of Valhalla

When you were first assigned to care for Loki’s chambers, you expected it to be as messy and visited as Fandral’s, minus the annoying bragging and showing-off-ness (Loki has way more class). But…

Read more…

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Cuddle piles and acceptence
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NzW5Yy

by Stingpenguin

After the events of AOU Pietro and Wanda Maximoff are often seen cuddling on the couch, and they’re still there in the morning. Slowly, as the Avengers start accepting them, more join. Over the course of a few weeks, Wanda and Pietro land themselves boyfriends, and theres now nightly cuddle piles in random people’s rooms, most often the common floor.

Words: 567, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

by Stingpenguin

After the events of AOU Pietro and Wanda Maximoff are often seen cuddling on the couch, and they’re still there in the morning. Slowly, as the Avengers start accepting them, more join. Over the course of a few weeks, Wanda and Pietro land themselves boyfriends, and theres now nightly cuddle piles in random people’s rooms, most often the common floor.

blog.name: marvel-countdown
blog.title: miles morales is actually my son i adopted him
blog.description:
the amount of days until all my favorite people will defeat nutsack chin man together and save the universe and live happily ever after and pepperony are gonna get married and they’re all gonna go to central park and eat expensive gelato to celebrate and tony’s gonna buy everyone gucci and i’m gonna cry even more than infinity war.

——————

twitter is pretty lit: @katmintgi

body:
300 days until A4 😤👌

so now that amatw is over (let’s scream together), should i do the mini countdown thing for venom? captain marvel? into the spider-verse??

summary: I forgot to mention, this is the other thing I spent my Fourth of July 2018 doing. I was drawing this while watching ‘Captain...
caption:
I forgot to mention, this is the other thing I spent my Fourth of July 2018 doing. I was drawing this while watching ‘Captain America: The First Avenger’ and ‘Winter Soldier’
It’s one thousand times harder to watch Marvel movies after you’ve taken a nose dive into the fandom. I am ridiculously attached to these characters now.

#Marvel #Drawing #WIP #CaptainAmerica #Doodle #Sketch #Avengers #happy100thbirthdaycaptainamerica #OriginalCharacter #FanArt #MarvelOC

title: 失落的一角
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ucPcnb

by sashach

巴奇是一個知名的好萊塢演員，其事業在過去六年每況愈下。讓他憂鬱的原因不僅於此，當年造成他失去一隻手臂的車禍也是另一個因素。他想逃離洛杉磯和目前的生活，他的經紀人／宣傳，克林特於是替他在克里夫蘭找了一個安靜的住處。他並不知道他的鄰居將對他的生活帶來劇烈改變。尤其是一個名叫史蒂夫・羅傑斯的鄰居。

Words: 418, Chapters: 1/12, Language: 中文

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Maria Hill, Jane Foster
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Post-Serum Steve Rogers, Winter Soldier Bucky Barnes, Romance, Slow Build, Angst, Fluff, Anxiety, Anxiety Attacks, Teacher Steve Rogers, Actor Bucky Barnes, Alternate Universe, Chinese Translation


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ucPcnb
